name: ULTIMATE VIDEO GALLERY
author: Webpsilon S.C.P.

sections.description:
Extremely quickly to use, add the url of videos and that’s it all. Thumbnails are created automatically. You can add multiple galleries in the same wp. Support for mobile devices.

Live DEMO and plugin page.

Key Features:

  • Video gallery to play youtube videos or flv files.
  • Width, height, round and border of the plugin are configurable.
  • A list of video thumbnails with paging. You can change the number of thumbnails per page.
  • Player size and size of thumbnails configurable.
  • Title and description for each video.
  • NEW. Subtitles for each video.
  • NEW. Main image configurable or automatic.
  • Thumbnail image configurable or automatic.
  • Different designs thumbnails.
  • Load youtube videos on mobiles like android or apple.
  • Autoplay configurable.
  • Dynamic management and very simple to create and manage multiple video galleries in one website.
  • The plugin installs the “Ultimate Video” widget, which allows you to display a gallery inside a widget.

Once installed and activated the plugin go to “WordPress admin -> settings -> ultimate video” to create and manage your video galleries. You can load the video gallery within a page or post using the code:

[ultimate 1/] Where 1 is the gallery ID

You can also use the ultimate widget to load the gallery into a widget.

With the latest update we’ve added support for mobile devices, such as Android or Apple. From a mobile device, the plugin loads a gallery in jquery that loads youtube videos through the device application.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ultimate-video-gallery folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure and create new video gallery in your WordPress settings: Ultimate video

  4. Place [ultimate ID /] in your Posts, where ID is the gallery ID.

  5. Admin params:

    • Gallery Width. Number indicating the width of the carousel. You can use a number in pixels or percentage. For example: 100% or 400px.

    • Gallery Height. Number indicating the height of the carousel. You must use a number with px. For example 400px.

    • Video URL. Write the url of your videos. You can write the url of the flv videos, the url of the videos on youtube(sample: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9I9Ar6upx34).

    • Main image. Write o select the image url.

    • Thumbnail image. Write o select the thumbnail url image.

    • Video Titles. Write the titles of your videos.

    • Video description. Write the description of your videos.

    • Video subtitles. Write the subtitles of your videos.
sections.faq:
What parameters should I set up to look good to me the freeultimate?

Once installed and activated, and the default plugin works correctly. The parameters are common to change the url videos. After adjusting the parameter width, height and get to the gallery is good.
sections.changelog:
1.4

Main video image and video subtitles.

1.3

This update allows the loading of YouTube videos with the format youtu.be, we have also solved a coding problem that occurred in several sites and that caused the plugin not show.

1.2

Support for mobile devices.

1.1

short_description: Create easily a nice gallery of videos for your site with youtube and/or flv videos.

upgrade_notice.1.3: This update allows the loading of YouTube videos with the format youtu.be, we have also solved a coding problem that occurred in several sites and that caused the plugin not show.
